title: St. John the Evangelist
marks: Signature and Date LRQ, in the print, in dark grey: [J. (?)/ J.S./ 17
description: twisting, contraposto pose, seen from back; head turned to look over PR shoulder; chalice with a snake in PR hand; PL arm crossed over body, holding a book to PR hip; architectural details in background; three shades of grey-green
creditline: Gift of Pia Gallo in honor of Richard L. Hillstrom
